[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@influxdata/influxdb-client](./influxdb-client.md) &gt; [QueryOptions](./influxdb-client.queryoptions.md)

## QueryOptions interface

QueryOptions contains QueryApi configuration options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface QueryOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [gzip](./influxdb-client.queryoptions.gzip.md) | boolean | Requests gzip encoded response. |
|  [now](./influxdb-client.queryoptions.now.md) | () =&gt; string | Specifies the time that should be reported as "now" in the query. RFC3339 value must be returned, for example <code>new Date().toISOString()</code>. |
|  [org](./influxdb-client.queryoptions.org.md) | string | Specifies the name of the organization executing the query. Takes either the ID or Name interchangeably. |
|  [type](./influxdb-client.queryoptions.type.md) | 'flux' | Type of the query, default is "flux" |
